alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead; Gallatin; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 4:48PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Madison, southeastern Beaverhead and southern Gallatin Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 448 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles west of Henrys Lake, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lakeview. This includes Highway 287 between mile markers 1 and 4 , and between mile markers 1 and 23. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM MDT for south central and southwestern Montana.
